item.title: Home Security Systems - Cameras, Alarms, Doorbells | Ring
item.description: Ultra-clear, Retinal 4K doorbells and cameras to help protect your spaces. A powerful multi-lens 4K camera with 140° to 360° coverage. Protect hard-to-see spaces with LED lights and siren. Secure large, open areas with ultra-bright LEDs and siren. Cover every corner with countless placement options.

item.title: Ring - Always Home - Apps on Google Play
item.description: Ring Doorbells and Cameras can send you instant alerts when someone’s at your door or motion is detected. Keep an eye on what matters with live HD video and greet visitors with Two-Way Talk.

item.title: Amazon.com: Ring Security System
item.description: Shop Ring security products for your home or business. Find alarm systems, doorbells, and surveillance cameras.

item.title: Amazon's Ring cancels Flock partnership amid Super Bowl ad ...
item.description: Ring's decision to cancel its partnership with Flock comes as tech companies face growing pressure to reexamine their work with federal agencies.

item.title: Ring Smart Home Security - Best Buy
item.description: Keep an eye on your home and make it more secure. Shop Best Buy for Ring smart doorbells, security cameras, alarm systems and more.

item.title: Ring Whole Home Camera Kit | Costco
item.description: Ring Whole Home Camera Kit, Battery Doorbell w/Head-to-Toe HD Video, Outdoor Cam Plus with 2K Visual Clarity and Color, Low Light Sight Delivers Clear Color in Near-dark, Pan-Tilt Indoor Cam with 360° Horizontal Pan Coverage, Add Ring Subscription Not Included, Sold Seperately,

item.title: Ring ends partnership with Flock, company that gives info to ...
item.description: Ring canceled its partnership with Flock, a tech company that works with police to help solve crime, days after a controversial Super Bowl ad.
